function.name: get_weather
function.description: Get current, hourly and daily weather information for a location. get_weather needs a place_id from function get_weather_place_id

location.description: City or place name, e.g., 'toronto' or 'new york'.

function.name: get_weather_place_id
function.description: Get an array of place_id string (among other info) used for the get_weather function, where each place id refers to a particular location. You will need to pick one place_id and use it for the function get_weather.

location.description: City or place name, e.g., 'Toronto, Canada' or 'New York, USA'.
